Package com.BrethrenAce.GameEngine.pieces

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
com.BrethrenAce.GameEngine.pieces.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Agent, Captain, Colonel, Flag, GeneralFive, GeneralFour, GeneralOne, GeneralThree, GeneralTwo, LtCol, LtOne, LtTwo, Major, Private, Sergeant
public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
An important Abstract class that serves as the parent of all sub-pieces, who will get to inherit this class' values. This class is heavily resourced from a certain chess engine tutorial on Youtube. Author: Brethren de la Gente Date: 2021-01-07

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    int legalPieceInstanceCount
    Allowed amount of piece instance owned by a Player in a single game
    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> mobility
    HashMap that contains the Piece mobility according to the Board coordinates system

    Piece alliance of this Piece
    int pieceCoords
    Coordinates of this Piece instance
    Player pieceOwner
    Player that owns this Piece
    int piecePower
    Power level of the piece to compare ranks
    java.lang.String rank
    Rank of the piece
